;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** ;* ;* NAME: ;* SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE ;* ;* PURPOSE: ;* RETURNS THE PIXEL RESOLUTION OR AREA FOR THE DIMITRI SENSORS ;* ;* CALLING SEQUENCE: ;* RES = SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE(SENSOR_PX) ;* ;* INPUTS: ;* SENSOR_PX - A STRING CONTAINING THE NAME OF THE SENSOR OF INTEREST ;* ;* KEYWORDS: ;* AREA - SET TO RETURN THE AREA OF EACH PIXEL IN KM^2 ;* VERBOSE - PROCESSING STATUS OUTPUTS ;* ;* OUTPUTS: ;* PX_RES - A FLOAT OF THE RESOLTION/AREA (KM/KM^2) ;* ;* COMMON BLOCKS: ;* NONE ;* ;* MODIFICATION HISTORY: ;* 23 DEC 2010 - C KENT - DIMITRI-2 V1.0 ;* 21 MAR 2011 - C KENT - MODIFIED FILE DEFINITION TO USE GET_DIMITRI_LOCATION ;* ;* VALIDATION HISTORY: ;* 23 DEC 2010 - C KENT - WINDOWS 32-BIT MACHINE IDL 7.1: COMPILATION AND CALLING SUCCESSFUL ;* ;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** FUNCTION SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE,SENSOR_PX,AREA=AREA,VERBOSE=VERBOSE IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE: RETRIEVEING DATA FOR SENSOR - ',SENSOR_PX ;------------------------------------ ; DEFINE SENSOR FILE SPS_FILE = GET_DIMITRI_LOCATION('SENSOR_DATA') RES = FILE_INFO(SPS_FILE) IF RES.EXISTS EQ 0 THEN BEGIN PRINT, 'SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE: ERROR, SENSOR INFORMATION FILE NOT FOUND' RETURN,-1 ENDIF ;------------------------------------ ; GET SENSOR DATA TEMPLATE IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN BEGIN PRINT,'SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE: RETRIEVEING SENSOR DATA TEMPLATE' TEMP = GET_DIMITRI_SENSOR_DATA_TEMPLATE(/VERBOSE) ENDIF ELSE TEMP = GET_DIMITRI_SENSOR_DATA_TEMPLATE() ;------------------------------------ ; FIND SENSOR MATCH WHITHIN FILE IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE: SEARCHING SENSOR FILE FOR INPUT SENSOR' SPS_DATA = READ_ASCII(SPS_FILE,TEMPLATE=TEMP) RES = WHERE(STRMATCH(SPS_DATA.SENSOR_ID,SENSOR_PX) EQ 1) ;------------------------------------ ; IF NO MATCH THEN ERROR AND RETURN IF RES[0] LT 0 THEN BEGIN PRINT,'SENSOR_PIXEL_SIZE: ERROR, NO SENSOR MATCH' RETURN,-1 ENDIF PX_RES = SPS_DATA.PIX_RES[RES] ;------------------------------------ ; IF AREA REQUIRED THEN SQUARE THE RESOLUTION IF KEYWORD_SET(AREA) THEN PX_RES = PX_RES^2 RETURN,PX_RES END
